casebody.data:
William J. Verriker et al. v. Waterbury Redevelopment Agency

King, C. J., Alcorn, House, Thim and Ryan, Js.

Argued October 9 decided October 9, 1969 John D. Mahoney, with whom were Robert 8. Kolesnik and, on the brief, Albert L. Finkelstein and James F. Meenan, for the appellant (defendant). Ernest A. Inglis, Jr., with whom were Max R. Traurig and, on the brief, Charles W. Page, for the appellees (plaintiffs). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
